titles.title: END Network Abuse Act of 2018

A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to establish an initiative on improving the capacity of military criminal investigative organizations to prevent child sexual exploitation, and for other purposes.
End National Defense Network Abuse Act of 2018
END Network Abuse Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
End National Defense Network Abuse Act of 2018 or the END Network Abuse Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Defense to establish (1) an initiative to improve the capacity of military criminal-investigative organizations to prevent child sexual exploitation, and (2) partnerships with various governmental and outside entities to improve practices and outcomes related to the prevention of child sexual exploitation.
